formatted_address: 1 Harbourfront Walk, Vivo City Fairprice Xtra, Unit, #B2-23, Singapore 098585
name: Tiong Hoe Specialty Coffee (VivoCity)

reviews.text: We finally found the cafe inside the supermarket, and ordered two flat whites. The espresso base was nutty but not too bitter, making the coffee very good. The barista was nice and friendly, and brought us water immediately after we ordered.

Tiong Hoeâ€™s coffees maintain their standards with their friendly baristas with their nicely done brews. Even the tea has a timing for customers to know when to start sipping their teas.

Itâ€™s sometimes hard to find good bottled cold brews and their Amber Black tastes good (La Linda batch), not too diluted, as fragrant as you might find with a freshly made hand brew.

Itâ€™s definitely a delight for grocery shoppers, wished there were more room for seats. Iâ€™m always glad to spot a Tiong Hoeâ€™s coffee stand! Thanks for the lovely coffee always!

The coffee I ordered was alo coffee natural
Itâ€™s was great!!!
The taste of acidity was soft and itâ€™s slightly sweet just the flavour I likedðŸ’™

Have tried the iced white ,the coffee bean must be dark roasted, not good flavor.

Wonâ€™t try again.
Tried their iced intense white - coffee was solid with speedy service! Got it to takeaway but there were seats available too when I was there in the late afternoon.

vicinity: 1 Harbourfront Walk, Vivo City Fairprice Xtra, Unit, #B2-23
